answers.answer: you really need to go get checked. It may just be the heat causing you to swell, there are lots of ladies suffering the same way, but if it is preeclampsia then it needs to be treated. If your doc suspects your blood pressure cannot be controlled then you will need some steroid injections to help mature baby's lungs incase they do have to deliver early. Go get checked out.

question: With my 1st preg I was diagnosed with preeclampsiya @37weeks & had to get induced. Now, with this one Im also getting swollen but, sooner than the 1st I'm 30weeks & 4days :/
title: What to do...??
